comments.author: MartyPartys.9187
comments.body:
I see, thanks for the explanation!

Do you know by any chance how long this usually takes till all the names are back up again? Is it minutes or hours?

comments.author: Stefan Larimore.6872
comments.body: I saw this too. This is a transient problem during a game update release, which just happened. I’m already seeing more world names.

comments.author: MartyPartys.9187
comments.body: Nevermind, I slowly see names being added again, they must be working on it.

comments.author: MartyPartys.9187
comments.body:
Is it just me or is the world names only returning the following no matter what you ask for?

[{"id":“1011”,“name”:“Stormbluff Isle”}]

https://api.guildwars2.com/v1/world_names.json
